whoAreWe.title: Who Are We?
whoAreWe.description: Sipeat is a company for installing and managing drink and snack machines, offering a full service – from installation to maintenance – for businesses and institutions in the central and Sharon regions. We believe in personal service, clean and maintained machines, and a perfect fit for the needs of each customer.

support.title: Always there when needed
support.description: Technical support and a quick response to any malfunction – without delays and without excuses.

price.title: Pleasure without breaking the bank
price.description: Our product prices are among the cheapest on the market, without compromising on quality!

customer.title: The customer is always at the center
customer.description: We listen, respond, and update according to your needs and desires.

suitableFor.title: Who is our service suitable for?
suitableFor.description: Sipeat's service is designed for places with constant movement of employees - such as offices and factories. Wherever employees are looking for a moment of refreshment during the day - we bring the perfect solution: advanced machines, accessible and full of treats. No fuss, no maintenance - just a smooth experience that fits into the routine of your place.
